
Simple tool to convert optical/high energy data to be used by XSPEC. 
Try XSPECfeeder -l for instructions or XSPECfeeder -h for help.



Installation tips:

sudo easy_install -U XSPECfeeder

or

tar xvzf XSPECfeeder-‘version’.tar.gz
cd XSPECfeeder-‘version’.tar
python setup.py build
sudo python setup.py install
